sentences.en: 100,000 federal workers will be laid off to reduce the deficit.
sentences.cn: 10万联邦公务人员将被辞退以减少赤字。

sentences.en: A congressional report charges that federal safety laws were recklessly violated.
sentences.cn: 一份国会报告指责联邦安全法被公然违反。

sentences.en: A Federal Court case had been fast tracked to Wednesday.
sentences.cn: 联邦法庭的一桩案件提前到星期三审理。

sentences.en: A federal marshal was killed in a shoot-out.
sentences.cn: 枪战中一名联邦警察局局长身亡。

sentences.en: Federal agents rushed him into a car.
sentences.cn: 联邦探员赶紧把他送进了一辆车里。

sentences.en: Federal leaders continued their efforts to secure a ceasefire.
sentences.cn: 联邦领导人继续争取促成停火协议。

sentences.en: He lowballed the cost of the project in order to obtain federal funding.
sentences.cn: 他为了得到联邦资助而故意压低项目的成本价格。

sentences.en: Last month, a federal grand jury began mulling evidence in the case.
sentences.cn: 联邦大陪审团于上月开始仔细审查本案的证据。

sentences.en: More vigorous action is needed to force the federal army to disengage.
sentences.cn: 需要更强有力的行动来迫使联邦军队撤军。

sentences.en: Mr Milner persuaded the federal prosecutors not to lock up his client.
sentences.cn: 米尔纳先生说服联邦检察官不把他的当事人关起来。

sentences.en: Refugees had come under attack from federal troops.
sentences.cn: 难民遭到了联邦军队的袭击。
瑞士是一个联邦共和国。

sentences.en: The 1985 federal budget allocated $7.3 billion for development programmes.
sentences.cn: 1985年的联邦预算将73亿美元拨给了开发项目。

sentences.en: There were a growing number of desertions from the federal army.
sentences.cn: 联邦部队中出现越来越多的开小差现象。

sentences.en: Twenty eight percent of the federal budget is spent on defense.

words.tran_cn: 同盟的；联邦制度下的；联合的
联邦的；联合的；结成同盟的
联邦地；联邦政府地；同盟地
联邦党；联邦制拥护者；支持北部联邦者
联合；联邦；联盟；联邦政府
结成同盟；按联邦制组织起来（federate的过去分词）
使结成同盟；使结成联邦

phrases.tran_cn: 联邦机构；联邦政府机构
美国联邦存款保险公司
联邦特区（联邦政府所在地区，等于Federal District）
联邦快递，美国联邦快递公司
联邦贸易委员会，联邦商务委员会（FTC）

trans.tran_en: a federal country or system of government consists of a group of states which control their own affairs, but which are also controlled by a single national government which makes decisions on foreign affairs, defence etc
